errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: Since the VM version paris, "difficulty" was replaced by "prevrandao", which now returns a random number based on the beacon chain.
  --> /Users/ch4rly/Desktop/ETH_Oxford/coinflip.sol:20:78:
   |
20 |         uint256 random = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp, block.difficulty, msg.sender))) % 2;
   |                                                                              ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
errors.message: Since the VM version paris, "difficulty" was replaced by "prevrandao", which now returns a random number based on the beacon chain.
